import React from 'react' import { AppBar, Toolbar, Typography, CssBaseline, Link, Button } from '@mui/material' import { useEffect,useState } from 'react' function Header() { const [user, setUser] = useState(null) if (localStorage.getItem('id')) { const url = `http://localhost:8000/api/user/${Number(localStorage.getItem('id'))}` function componentDidMount() { axios.get(url) .then(res => { const data = res.data setUser(data) }) } } return( Blog {localStorage.getItem('user') ? <> :
Register
} ) } export default Header
